title: Transfer Accounts
body: Hi I just have a question that I hope the community can answer for me :). I have an EUNE account currently in Plat 3 but I was thinking of transferring my account to the NA server. Now I know I have to play one ranked game to be placed but I was wondering how much it's going to drop me. Will I be placed in Plat 5 or due to my EU mmr that I'll be placed in Silver? My mmr atm is currently EU Plat mmr and I'm aware that the mmr in NA is much different.

replies.body:
Ranking at the moment won't have a big impact on the 2017 Ranked season. I can't estimate what your ranked tier will look like on NA vs EUNE, but MMR/Ranked is unique to a server, so it definitely will look different on NA. 

You can find out breakdown of the 2017 Ranked Season [here.](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/game-updates/competitive/how-rank-2017-season) Let me know if you have any questions.
